page.title: 06Comparing 1850 & 1985 maps.
page.content: There are{more roads}on the{newer map than the older map.The 1985 map has {more built up areas}than the 1850 map. There are no built up areas towards Silverwood and Gulling wood on the old map.The{old map doesn't show the {dismantled railway;}it shows it on the 1985 map so it must have been built and pulled down in that time.There was {not a motorway}on the{1850 map}because cars were not invented then.On the 1850 map Holly house is a farm but on the 1985 Holly house has been changed to Ravenfield Grange.There was {a guide post}at{Micklebring}on the {1850 map}but it is not there now on the 1985 map.Near Holly house Braithwell Road on the 1850 map,it is not a built up area but on the 1985 map there are now many houses.{On Moor {lane South} at the{crossroads}it is a {more built up area}on the 1985 map.
